content: I'm looking into a couple of issues around clippy configuration, but I'm still pretty new to how clippy works. This comment talks about cargo clippy and the clippy plugin. What is the clippy plugin? How do I use it?
Ah, it looks like the clippy plugin is deprecated: https://blog.rust-lang.org/inside-rust/2019/11/04/Clippy-removes-plugin-interface.html
